title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: There is a bug in the Photon version where the popup menu does not appear when right clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor. This menu is supposed to allow users to add breakpoints or marks, but it does not show up.
OB: Open a Java editor and right click on the left vertical ruler.
EB: The popup menu to add breakpoints or marks does not appear.
SR: Investigate and fix the issue to ensure that the popup menu appears when right clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor.
